definition: (emphatic sentence-final particle, used instead of 啊[a5] after a word ending in "n")
which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)
(coll.) not at all (humble expression denying compliment)/don't mention it
what's that have to do with it?/what's the connection?
what's that have to do with it?/what's the connection?

sentences.english: anywhere you want to go,  there's always somebody friendly.
sentences.chinese: 無論你想去哪兒，都會有些友好的人。

sentences.english: But it donot make it any better, what Idid.
sentences.chinese: 但是我做的也好不到哪兒去。

sentences.english: And where do I find shoelaces?
sentences.chinese: 還有我去哪兒可以找到鞋帶。

sentences.english: Your raw wool scarf is so beautiful; where did you buy it?
sentences.chinese: 你這條原毛圍巾真漂亮，是從哪兒買的？

sentences.english: Lesson Thirty-seven How could a beautiful girl learn Monkey Boxing?
sentences.chinese: 第三十七課哪兒有漂亮姑娘學猴拳的？

sentences.english: For instance, some clandestine publications are beautifully produced. Well, where did the paper come from?
sentences.chinese: 舉例說，有些祕密刊物印得那麼漂亮，哪兒來的紙？

sentences.english: Looks that way(q14). You gonna open it or stick your thumb up your butt?
sentences.chinese: 你是想打開它還是在哪兒站着傻看？

sentences.english: " Big cocks and old hens walked over to spend, "touch Where's the matter?
sentences.chinese: 大公雞和老花母雞走過去，“碰哪兒啦？

sentences.english: Do you know where my trousers are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我的褲子在哪兒嗎？

sentences.english: Where do we submit the tender?
I didn't know that I was going to ride, and that it would be night.
sentences.chinese: 我哪兒知道要騎馬，又要走到三更半夜呢。

sentences.english: Would the P.R. team be willing to say what the problem is?
sentences.chinese: 公關團隊會告訴我問題核心在哪兒嗎？

sentences.english: Anita, you haven't decided where you are going on holiday?
sentences.chinese: 艾尼塔，你還沒決定去哪兒度假嗎？

sentences.english: He was here a moment ago. I wonder where he is now.
sentences.chinese: 他剛纔還在這兒，現在不知道到哪兒去了。

sentences.english: Can you tell me where I might apply for an import licence?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我在哪兒辦理申請進口執照嗎？

definition: where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
